prompt: Design a playful products list interface with a vertical scrollable layout. Each product card should feature a large circular icon placeholder with a colorful background (random pastel colors), product name in bold black typography, a short description in gray, and the price in pink. Include an 'Add to Cart' button with a yellow background and rounded corners. Use a white scaffold background with medium card shadows. Ensure 16px padding around the list and 12px between cards. The app bar should have a white background with a black title and a colorful gradient border at the bottom.
